resources.string:
This is the game of Tiles. In it you try to arrange a scrambled set of tiles numbered from 1 to 15.

Finish with the top-left an empty square, and the numbers running from left-to-right, and top-to-bottom.

(The final number 15 will be in the bottom-right square).
Play continues until either you complete the game, or give up!\n\nThat\'s as easy as it gets !

Tiles is a simple game, based on code from an early terminal-style computer, the DEC-PDP-8, and written in BASIC. The game was originally ported to the Apple II, and now to here.
